title: Watchdog  anti theft
summary: Your smartphone becomes an alarm system. With geo tracking & remote control.
description: *** Now with Remote control ** This app has been specially designed to protect your property from theft or at least make it harder for a theft to occur. Here are some application examples:Change in brightnessThe change in the brightness can be a sign that your gym locker was broken into.MovementHide your Smartphone in your car or motorcycle and enable the monitoring of the movement.Geo-PositionMonitor any object on the change of the geo-location: put your smartphone into a pocket or jacket.For questions and suggestions, please contact us at www.watchdog-anti-theft.comPrivacy policywatchdog - anti-theft communicates with the watchdog server and needs an Internet connection to check your premium status and if you have activated the geo-tracking function or remote control.Your premium user data such as name, email and password as well as the tracking data are stored anonymously and encrypted on the watchdog server and in no case passed on to third parties.
descriptionHTML:
*** Now with Remote control **

This app has been specially designed to protect your property from theft or at least make it harder for a theft to occur. Here are some application examples:

Change in brightness
The change in the brightness can be a sign that your gym locker was broken into.

Movement
Hide your Smartphone in your car or motorcycle and enable the monitoring of the movement.

Geo-Position
Monitor any object on the change of the geo-location: put your smartphone into a pocket or jacket.

For questions and suggestions, please contact us at www.watchdog-anti-theft.com

Privacy policy

watchdog - anti-theft communicates with the watchdog server and needs an Internet connection to check your premium status and if you have activated the geo-tracking function or remote control.

Your premium user data such as name, email and password as well as the tracking data are stored anonymously and encrypted on the watchdog server and in no case passed on to third parties.
comments: I love it  everyone you can use
We need watchdog remote app for control from another phone

Good app BUT! 1.The sms is not delivered (I do not know if is it sent). 2.When call is activated, it displays on screen-bad step,because the thief can easily end a call even before it starts ringing on the another phone. 3.Application is unfunctional when screen is locked (even with swipe too). Refine these and it will be very helpful application! Correction: I reinstall the app,and sms is now delivered :-) . Other bugs stays.
recentChanges: - Sensor data can be displayed on the main view
